help.short: The name of the backup instance.
The name of the backup vault.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="backupDatasourceParametersList">
<prop type="array" name="containersList" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="backupHookReferences">
<prop type="array" name="excludedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="excludedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="includedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="includedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="labelSelectors">
<prop type="array" name="dataStoreParametersList">
<prop type="array<@UserFacingError_read>" name="details">
<prop type="array" name="recommendedAction">

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the backup instance.
The name of the backup vault.
Proxy Resource tags.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList" options="backup-datasource-parameters-list">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].BlobBackupDatasourceParameters.containersList" options="containers-list" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.backupHookReferences" options="backup-hook-references">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.excludedNamespaces" options="excluded-namespaces">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.excludedResourceTypes" options="excluded-resource-types">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.includedNamespaces" options="included-namespaces">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.includedResourceTypes" options="included-resource-types">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.labelSelectors" options="label-selectors">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.dataStoreParametersList" options="data-store-parameters-list">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="backupDatasourceParametersList" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList">
<prop type="array" name="containersList" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].BlobBackupDatasourceParameters.containersList" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="backupHookReferences" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.backupHookReferences">
<prop type="array" name="excludedNamespaces" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.excludedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="excludedResourceTypes" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.excludedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="includedNamespaces" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.includedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="includedResourceTypes" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.includedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="labelSelectors" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.backupDatasourceParametersList[].KubernetesClusterBackupDatasourceParameters.labelSelectors">
<prop type="array" name="dataStoreParametersList" arg="$parameters.properties.policyInfo.policyParameters.dataStoreParametersList">

<prop type="array" name="backupDatasourceParametersList">
<prop type="array" name="containersList" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="backupHookReferences">
<prop type="array" name="excludedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="excludedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="includedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="includedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="labelSelectors">
<prop type="array" name="dataStoreParametersList">
<prop type="array<@UserFacingError_read>" name="details">
<prop type="array" name="recommendedAction">

help.short: The name of the backup instance.
The name of the backup vault.
Proxy Resource tags.
Gets or sets the data source information.
DatasourceType of the resource.
Type of Datasource object, used to initialize the right inherited type
Full ARM ID of the resource. For azure resources, this is ARM ID. For non azure resources, this will be the ID created by backup service via Fabric/Vault.
Location of datasource.
Unique identifier of the resource in the context of parent.
Properties specific to data source
Type of the specific object - used for deserializing
Resource Type of Datasource.
Uri of the resource.
Gets or sets the data source set information.
DatasourceType of the resource.
Type of Datasource object, used to initialize the right inherited type
Full ARM ID of the resource. For azure resources, this is ARM ID. For non azure resources, this will be the ID created by backup service via Fabric/Vault.
Location of datasource.
Unique identifier of the resource in the context of parent.
Properties specific to data source set
Resource Type of Datasource.
Uri of the resource.
Credentials to use to authenticate with data source provider.
Secret store resource
Gets or sets the type of secret store
Uri to get to the resource
Gets or sets value stored in secret store resource
Gets or sets the Backup Instance friendly name.
Contains information of the Identity Details for the BI. If it is null, default will be considered as System Assigned.
Specifies if the BI is protected by System Identity.
ARM URL for User Assigned Identity.
Type of Backup or Restore Instance for request body.
Gets or sets the policy information.
Specifies the type of validation. In case of DeepValidation, all validations from /validateForBackup API will run again.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="backupDatasourceParametersList">
<prop type="array" name="containersList" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="backupHookReferences">
<prop type="array" name="excludedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="excludedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="includedNamespaces">
<prop type="array" name="includedResourceTypes">
<prop type="array" name="labelSelectors">
<prop type="array" name="dataStoreParametersList">
<prop type="array<@UserFacingError_read>" name="details">
<prop type="array" name="recommendedAction">
